title: A Safe Place for Feelings
itunes:author: Guests: Josh & Christi Straub
itunes:summary:
When your son or daughter is feeling down, where does he or she turn to for help? As a parent, it's good to give your child a safe place to express his or her emotions. John and Danny give some tips for helping your kids work through their feelings.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast, or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get the children's book "What Am I Feeling?" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2021-09-02?refcd=1146803

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/a-safe-place-for-feelings/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
